summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SuperCA GST/Tax automation app. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success) but frontend authentication flow has integration issues preventing complete UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: User authentication not completing properly - form resets after login attempt
User not redirected to dashboard after successful API authentication

integration_issues.issue: Frontend-backend authentication integration not working properly

passed_tests: ITC Statement PDF Generation (PDF created successfully)
Tally XML Generation from GST Filing (XML & Summary created)
Tally Voucher XML Generation (XML created with correct structure)
Dashboard Stats API (All data fields present)
Frontend UI Structure (No JavaScript errors on load)

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - UI loads but authentication flow broken

critical_issues: Fix frontend authentication integration - users cannot login to access GST filing features
Debug login form submission and response handling
Ensure proper redirect to dashboard after successful login
Test signup flow to allow new user registration
action_item_for_main_agent.backend_status: All backend APIs working perfectly - no issues found
action_item_for_main_agent.priority: HIGH - Authentication is blocking access to all GST features
